### Problem 9

Find the **(a)** mean, **(b)** median, and **(c)** variance for the following set of scores:

{0, 2, 5, 6, 3, 3, 3, 1, 4, 3}

```{r}
scores <- c(0, 2, 5, 6, 3, 3, 3, 1, 4, 3)

# mean
mean(scores)

# median
median(scores)

# variance
var(scores)

```

**d.** Find the set of Z scores for the data.

```{r}
z_scores <- (scores - mean(scores)) / (var(scores))
z_scores
```
